articles.title: AI Apocalypse? Why Language Surrounding Tech Is Sounding Increasingly Religious
articles.summary: TORONTO (AP) ‚Äî At 77 years old, Geoffrey Hinton has a new calling in life. Like a modern-day prophet, the Nobel Prize winner is raising alarms about the dangers of uncontrolled and unregulated artificial intelligence.

articles.title: India's Reliance ties up with Google and Meta to drive AI push
articles.summary: Indian conglomerate Reliance Industries announced new partnerships with Google and Meta to accelerate the company's push into artificial intelligence.

articles.title: Dell slides as high AI server costs, competition blunt upbeat demand forecast
articles.summary: Shares of Dell Technologies fell about 7% premarket on Friday, as high manufacturing costs for AI-optimized servers and intensifying competition overshadowed the company's bullish demand forecast for artificial intelligence infrastructure.
